divs: Sighting DetailsLooked up from our balcony facing southwest, directly up below where commuter planes would fly I saw a very bright orb in daylight. It was reflecting the sun. It was wobbling. I focused better to make sure it wasn't a seagull and saw another sphere just as bright but smaller rotating around the larger sphere in tandem like a a gyroscope. It moved rather quickly in a southeast direction and I lost it behind trees directly in front of my balcony. When I came back with my camera phone I couldn't find it. It was a bit chilly that day, no big winds and no clouds in the area of siting. I was mesmerized for the time I followed it in the sky. I was not afraid.
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Santa Clarita
There was one other sighting in Santa Clarita on or around November 12th 2010
Summary: Large bright white sphere with another smaller sphere gyroscoping together
